==Trivia==
*At 60FPS, unlike other [[Claymore]] users, Diluc cannot directly enter a Charged Attack sequence from a standstill. From a standstill, he must perform one Normal Attack before entering his Charged Attack sequence. However, if Diluc is affected by the {{Cryo}} status, if the attack button is held down immediately after a [[Sprinting#Dash|Dash]], or if the attack button is held down alongside a directional button, he will be able to directly enter his Charged Attack sequence without performing a Normal Attack. This however, does not occur at 30FPS.
